meanings: lay[put] stress on, put[place] emphasis on, regard[consider, look upon] sth as important
consider the process as being more important than the result
value the process more than the result
O형에 관한 표현 You are someone who values human relations.
O형에 관한 표현 You are someone who treats human relations importantly.
